metadata.name: AS9100D_Complete_Audit_System_With_Workflows
metadata.title: AS9100D Audit System with Functional Workflow Chains
metadata.description: Complete AS9100D Internal Audit Management System with 4 functional workflow chains: Annual Planning, Audit Execution, Corrective Action, and Continuous Improvement. Each workflow demonstrates start/end nodes, task sequences, decision branching, and proper workflow navigation.

nodes.name: Start
nodes.description: Begin Annual Audit Program Planning Process

nodes.name: Review Management Review Results
nodes.description: Review outputs from previous management review including identified improvement areas, organizational changes, and strategic direction

nodes.name: Identify Areas Requiring Audit Focus
nodes.description: Determine which processes, departments, or AS9100D clauses require audit attention based on risk, changes, and previous results

nodes.name: Review Risk-Based Audit Approach
nodes.description: Apply risk-based thinking to prioritize audit activities based on process criticality, complexity, and potential impact

nodes.name: Update Annual Audit Program
nodes.description: Document audit objectives, scope, criteria, frequency, and methods for each planned audit

nodes.name: Allocate Resources and Assign Auditors
nodes.description: Assign qualified auditors ensuring competence and independence requirements are met

nodes.name: Develop Audit Schedule
nodes.description: Create detailed schedule considering process importance, changes, previous results, and resource availability

nodes.name: Communicate Program to Organization
nodes.description: Inform all relevant personnel about the audit program, schedule, and expectations

nodes.name: Management Approval?
nodes.description: Management reviews and approves or requests revisions to the audit program

nodes.name: Monitor Program Execution
nodes.description: Track audit completion, findings, and effectiveness on a monthly basis

nodes.name: Changes Needed?
nodes.description: Determine if program adjustments are needed based on organizational changes, incidents, or other factors

nodes.name: End
nodes.description: Annual Planning Process Complete

nodes.name: Start
nodes.description: Begin Individual Audit Execution

nodes.name: Define Audit Scope
nodes.description: Establish audit objectives, criteria, scope, duration, and locations to be audited

nodes.name: Select Auditors
nodes.description: Assign qualified auditors ensuring independence, competence, and impartiality requirements are met

nodes.name: Prepare Audit Checklist
nodes.description: Develop audit checklist based on AS9100D requirements, procedures, and risk areas

nodes.name: Review Documents
nodes.description: Review relevant procedures, work instructions, previous audit reports, and process documentation

nodes.name: Conduct Opening Meeting
nodes.description: Present audit plan, confirm scope, introduce team, and establish communication protocols

nodes.name: Collect Evidence
nodes.description: Gather objective evidence through interviews, observations, and examination of records

nodes.name: Document Findings
nodes.description: Record all audit findings (conformities, nonconformities, observations) with supporting evidence

nodes.name: Analyze Findings
nodes.description: Classify findings by severity (major/minor nonconformity, observation) and determine impact

nodes.name: Conduct Closing Meeting
nodes.description: Present audit results, findings, and conclusions to auditee management

nodes.name: Prepare Audit Report
nodes.description: Complete formal audit report within 5 days documenting scope, findings, conclusions, and recommendations

nodes.name: Findings Require CA?
nodes.description: Determine if findings require corrective action or can be closed

nodes.name: Track Corrective Actions
nodes.description: Monitor status and implementation of corrective action plans

nodes.name: Verify Effectiveness
nodes.description: Verify that corrective actions effectively addressed the root cause and prevented recurrence

nodes.name: Close Audit
nodes.description: Formally close the audit after all findings are resolved and verified

nodes.name: Update Program Metrics
nodes.description: Update audit program statistics and performance indicators

nodes.name: End
nodes.description: Audit Execution Complete

nodes.name: Start
nodes.description: Begin Corrective Action Process

nodes.name: Finding Identified
nodes.description: Nonconformity or improvement opportunity identified through audit or other source

nodes.name: Auditee Receives Report
nodes.description: Process owner receives formal notification of finding with details and evidence

nodes.name: CA Required?
nodes.description: Determine if formal corrective action is needed based on severity (major vs minor finding)

nodes.name: Perform Root Cause Analysis
nodes.description: Use appropriate tools (5 Whys, Fishbone, etc.) to identify true root cause, not just symptoms

nodes.name: Develop CA Plan
nodes.description: Create corrective action plan addressing root cause with specific actions, responsibilities, and timelines

nodes.name: Plan Approved?
nodes.description: Quality management reviews and approves or requests revision to corrective action plan

nodes.name: Implement Corrective Action
nodes.description: Execute the approved corrective action plan including containment and permanent corrective actions

nodes.name: Verify Implementation
nodes.description: Confirm that corrective actions were implemented as planned

nodes.name: Wait Appropriate Time
nodes.description: Allow sufficient time for corrective action to demonstrate effectiveness in preventing recurrence

nodes.name: Verify Effectiveness
nodes.description: Conduct follow-up verification to ensure corrective action prevented recurrence of the issue

nodes.name: Effective?
nodes.description: Determine if corrective action successfully prevented recurrence

nodes.name: Close Finding
nodes.description: Formally close the finding with documentation of all actions taken and verification results

nodes.name: Update Risk Register
nodes.description: Update organizational risk register based on findings and corrective actions taken

nodes.name: Document Lessons Learned
nodes.description: Capture lessons learned and share knowledge to prevent similar issues across the organization

nodes.name: End
nodes.description: Corrective Action Process Complete

nodes.name: Start
nodes.description: Begin Continuous Improvement Cycle

nodes.name: Identify Observations & Positive Practices
nodes.description: Collect observations, positive practices, and improvement opportunities from audits

nodes.name: Analyze Trends Across Audits
nodes.description: Review multiple audit results to identify patterns, trends, and systemic issues

nodes.name: Identify Systemic Opportunities
nodes.description: Determine opportunities for systemic improvements that benefit multiple processes or the entire QMS

nodes.name: Review with Management
nodes.description: Present improvement opportunities to management for review and resource allocation

nodes.name: Prioritize Improvements
nodes.description: Rank improvements based on impact, feasibility, resources required, and strategic alignment

nodes.name: Implement Changes
nodes.description: Execute approved improvement initiatives with assigned resources and timelines

nodes.name: Monitor Results
nodes.description: Track performance indicators to measure impact and effectiveness of improvements

nodes.name: Results Positive?
nodes.description: Evaluate if improvements achieved desired outcomes and benefits

nodes.name: Share Best Practices
nodes.description: Communicate successful improvements across the organization for replication in other areas

nodes.name: Update Procedures?
nodes.description: Determine if documented procedures need updating to reflect improvements

nodes.name: Update Documentation
nodes.description: Revise procedures, work instructions, and quality manuals to reflect implemented improvements

nodes.name: Include in Next Audit Scope
nodes.description: Add improved areas to next audit cycle to verify sustained effectiveness

nodes.name: Feed into Management Review
nodes.description: Include improvement results and metrics in management review for strategic decision making

nodes.name: Continue Cycle?
nodes.description: Determine if continuous improvement cycle should restart with new opportunities

nodes.name: End
nodes.description: Continuous Improvement Cycle Complete
